DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if a combination of 10 nutritional supplements provide health benefits that are consistent with protection against age-related disease. All supplements have been shown in previous studies to have health benefits when administered alone. The hypothesis is that 6 months of taking 10 nutritional supplements each day will provide beneficial changes in healthy related measures.
DOC.brief_title: Can Fish Oil and Phytochemical Supplements Mimic Anti-Aging Effects of Calorie Restriction?
DOC.criteria: age 4060 yr body mass index of 21 30 kg/m2 sedentary to moderately active eating a typical US diet history of any chronic disease other than mild osteoarthritis use of medications other than occasional use of nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drugs, antihistamines, antacids or laxatives use of nutritional supplements smoking alcohol intake greater than two drinks per day for women and three drinks per day for men
